title: Please, Nico!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Nico! Can you make some lunch for me too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Eh? What’s with you all of a sudden?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu heard that you’re very family-oriented and a good cook. That’s why Lanzhu wants to try eating some of your food.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>It’s true that Nico is good at cooking, but you don’t understand my true charm, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu does! You’re a great school idol, Nico! Lanzhu saw you in a school idol magazine once. It said that you’re number one in the universe. To be a good cook on top of that is unbelievable!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You....! You do understand!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That’s why, please, Nico! Lanzhu wants to try your cooking.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>I guess it can’t be helped! Tell me what you want to eat!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Peking Duck!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, let’s just settle with chicken karaage, okay! It’s decided!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
